name: Casey Alexander's Abode
blurb: A dilapidated wizard tower that's been retrofitted with silver jewlery, weapons, cutlery, and more
people: Doctor Casey Alexander: A retired human doctor stricked with paranoid about a supposed werewolf, even though no one else in the area believes in such a thing. She wears layers of silver jewlery and continues to spread anything made of silver among the grounds of the tower.
